hotspots.label: Grasshopper's Eye
hotspots.fact: Grasshoppers have large eyes that can see in almost all directions at once! This helps them spot predators and find food quickly.

hotspots.label: Strong Back Legs
hotspots.fact: A grasshopper's back legs are specially designed for jumping. They have powerful muscles that let them leap up to 20 times their own body length!

hotspots.label: Deep Red Flower
hotspots.fact: This dark red flower attracts insects like grasshoppers with its bright color and sweet nectar. The grasshopper uses its mouth to drink the nectar.

hotspots.label: Green Body Camouflage
hotspots.fact: The grasshopper's green color helps it blend in with plants and leaves. This camouflage keeps it safe from animals that want to eat it!
